issue.title: Bugfix pack for EXTRACT
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

A list of bugs have been found in extract, detailed list "here":https://projets.asitvd.ch/projects/extracteur/issues?utf8=%E2%9C%93&set_filter=1&sort=id%3Adesc&f%5B%5D=fixed_version_id&op%5Bfixed_version_id%5D=%3D&v%5Bfixed_version_id%5D%5B%5D=123&f%5B%5D=tracker_id&op%5Btracker_id%5D=%3D&v%5Btracker_id%5D%5B%5D=23&f%5B%5D=&c%5B%5D=tracker&c%5B%5D=status&c%5B%5D=priority&c%5B%5D=subject&c%5B%5D=assigned_to&c%5B%5D=done_ratio&group_by=&t%5B%5D=

Bugs fixed in EXTRACT 1.1 (should be release in easySDI 4.5.1): 
* Quotation marks are not escaped in the dynamic properties -> crash
* When a perimeter exceeds 4000 characters the request is not imported.
* File size limit upload 	
* For the update doc: specify to delete the folders[tomcat]/temp/*-extract*/
* Users cannot change their password
* Rules written on several lines do not match
* Archive plugin overwrites files with the same name
* Long remark not correctly displayed
* Unable to display the list of current requests on the home page on IE



**Fixed versions :** 4.5.1
